programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: NFC South co-leaders in the Buccaneers and Panthers clash in North Carolina. Tampa Bay has dropped two in a row, and five of its last six games. Carolina is 3-4 in its last seven, alternating losses and wins. The Bucs have won five straight meetings.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The AFC West-best Broncos (12-2) put an 11-game win streak on the line versus another hot side in the AFC South-leading Jaguars (10-4). Jacksonville has won five in a row. Denver owns the NFL's best record after outlasting Green Bay 34-26 in Week 15.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Patriots (11-3) continue pursuit of the AFC's best record as they visit the Ravens (7-7) on Sunday Night Football. New England is 6-0 on the road this season, but failed to put a chokehold on the AFC East by losing at home to Buffalo on Dec. 14.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Aggies (6-6) and Cougars (6-6) take to the blue turf of Albertsons Stadium for the Famous Idaho Potato Bowl. Utah State fell to Georgia State 45-22 in 2023, dropping its Potato Bowl record to 1-4. Washington State topped Utah State 49-28 in 2024.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A shooting victim mutters the name of her apparent assailant before dying, but fingerprint comparisons, handwriting analysis, ballistics and DNA testing show someone else close to home is the true killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives probe what looks like the ritualistic sacrifice of a 7-year-old Nigerian boy and uncover a slave-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Family members become murder suspects when DNA tests on the body of a 16-year-old girl reveal evidence of incest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man is found castrated and left for dead, Rollins and Carisi uncover three female suspects who have possible motives; Langan gives devastating news to Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler take over the search for a runaway girl and are led to an underground rave culture that caters to wayward teens.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A pediatrician found guilty of sexually assaulting four of his patients is murdered; after three years in the Witness Protection Program, Alexandra Cabot returns.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives investigate after a school nurse notices multiple injuries on a young girl; Detective Amaro tries to bond with his recently discovered son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro must face the consequence of his reckless behavior; when an online ad for escorts leads to the rape and robbery of tourists, Benson discovers she has a connection to one of the suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman wants to recant her testimony and free her father, who was incarcerated for incest and rape when she was a child; Capt. Cragen, who remembers the original investigation, tries to help the team.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a wealthy couple laundering money for South American drug dealers is murdered, former ADA Alexandra Cabot (Stephanie March) returns from witness protection to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: DDA Jonah Dekker (Terrence Howard) comes to New York to defend his cousin, who has been accused of rape; ADA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) helps Detectives Stabler and Benson with the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, the squad discovers a suspect who seems to be targeting young, vulnerable women with a similar personal connection; Dr. Huang delves into his past in order to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team must proceed with caution when an underage escort is found dead at a wild bachelor party with high-profile people in attendance; Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters), a former SVU detective who is working under, helps Benson and Amaro investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad reels from the fallout of Capt. Cragen being arrested for the murder of an escort.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into Capt. Cragen and two warring escort services continues; Brian Cassidy's undercover work becomes increasingly difficult; Amaro struggles with the case and his marriage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Holiday celebrations are interrupted when Detective Tutuola's ex-brother-in-law is arrested for attacking a priest; during the investigation, a church scandal is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU is called in to help investigate a wave of hate crimes on Christmas Eve; Rollins catches up with an old flame.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi and Rollins work together on an important arraignment; Benson tries to make Noah's Christmas wish come true when a case falls in her lap.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a teenage girl assaulted in the projects leads to a startling discovery; Benson puts her trust in someone from her past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Amaro asks the SVU for help in clearing a convicted man's name and brings a figure from Benson's past back into her life.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler; Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barba agrees to take the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler take over the search for a runaway girl and are led to an underground rave culture that caters to wayward teens.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: DDA Jonah Dekker (Terrence Howard) comes to New York to defend his cousin, who has been accused of rape; ADA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) helps Detectives Stabler and Benson with the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, the squad discovers a suspect who seems to be targeting young, vulnerable women with a similar personal connection; Dr. Huang delves into his past in order to help solve the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interview an overprotective woman (Diane Verona) to find out why her son is scavenging for food in the garbage; the boy later is later found dead and his older brother confesses to killing him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After finding out a dead teenage girl was a bully, detectives look for murder suspects at her school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a Chinese woman's daughter is held for ransom by smugglers, the detectives turn to her sister for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The son of an outspoken critic becomes the prime suspect when the star of a controversial teen show is raped in her trailer on the set.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a man whose 12-year-old wife is hospitalized with pregnancy complications, and they learn that he is the leader of a cult.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A professor (Billy Campbell) accused of sexual assault volunteers to submit a DNA sample for testing, but the case turns into a he-said, she-said standoff.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After recovering from being shot during a robbery, Fin returns to the narcotics division to keep a promise he made to locate a missing person.

programme.title: Premier League Live
programme.desc: Discussion and analysis of Premier League soccer.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Fulham FC and Nottingham Forest FC gather at Craven Cottage for this Premier League outing. Forest have won three of their past four across all competitions after blanking Spurs 3-0 in league play Dec. 14. Fulham beat Forest twice in 2024-25.

programme.desc: The best moments from the weekend in Premier League action.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: Braun storms Fort Worth for ribs, shareables, and a deep dive into Texas food and heritage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gang member is pushed from a rooftop in what appears to be retribution for a sexual assault, but when the assault victim also turns up dead, the detectives realize the case is far more complicated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tip leads Benson and Cragen to the body of a 7-year-old boy, missing since 1980, and the detectives think the new information was a ploy to help the suspected killer, on death row for another murder, delay his execution.
